parameters: Oh hey!\. A fellow protagonist! Welcome!\.
Do you need to know anything about \I[97]s?
\C[1]Prepare for a bunch of nonstop text\C[0]
\I[97]s are an amazing class of weapon!\.
They're the most iconic weapon in all RPGs ever!
Due to being the most iconic weapon class in history,\. they
also are the most average across the board in terms of stats.
\C[1]Almost every sword has a three-hit combo\C[0] with a
In this world,\. there is only one weapon class of swords,\.
but within it there are actually three types of swords you can
The \C[1]Broad Sword\C[0], aka the basic 1-hand weapon.\.
King of being average across the board!
Bearing moderate cooldowns, moderate attack, and moderate TP gain,\.
it is the goto weapon for single or dual-wielding swordspeople!
The \C[1]Two-Hand Sword\C[0], aka the basic 2-hand weapon.\.
A weapon meant for destroying your foes!
It's cooldowns are a bit higher and swings a bit slower, but it
makes up for it with high TP gain and high damage output.
The \C[1]Light Edge\C[0], aka the weightless 1-hand weapon.\.
A weapon optimized for dual-wielding and slaughtering at high speeds!
It has notoriously low cooldowns, but compensates by having a pretty
low damage and TP gain. Most people dual-wield these types.
There may be \C[2]other unique swords\C[0] out there,\. but
most swords fall into one of those three categories!
Yeah, people tell me I talk a lot sometimes...
Oh man do I LOVE talking about SPEARS!!
I bet you don't even know what a spear is.
BUT THAT IS OKAY AND I WILL TELL YOU WHAT A SPEAR IS.
You see, first a man \I[185] and a lady \I[878] hook up and-
Oh,\. maybe I don't need to talk about that graphic of
BEING ABLE TO \C[1]STAB SOMEONE FROM FOUR SPACES AWAY\C[0] IS THE BEST.
Did you know that most spears also have a \C[1]four-hit combo\C[0]?
If that wasn't enough, just you wait till I tell you something
else about how fucking great spears are...
Okay, so most all types of weapons can land critical hits...
BUT SPEARS CAN CRIT EXTRA HARD.
I was told that due to the fact that \C[2]all spears take two hands\C[0]
to wield, that they get a bit of extra bonuses to stats.
AND ONE OF THOSE STATS IS CRIT DAMAGE.
THIS IS SO EXCITING I AM GETTING MOIST.
So you say "but \C[1]spear-loving student\C[0], why would I give
up my offhand equipment slot to wrap both my hands around the
BECAUSE YOU ARE A TRUE WARRIOR WHO WANTS TO DESTROY HIS ENEMIES.
TAKE UP YOUR SPEAR AND PENETRATE ALL YOUR FOES WITH YOUR MIGHTY
WOOD. THE LAST TWO HITS WILL HIT ANYTHING AND EVERYTHING IN LINE.
\}My spear is wooden because \C[5]trainer lord\C[0] said I can't use real metal yet...\{
AND WHAT IS MORE, \C[3]THE FASTER YOU ARE, THE MORE DAMAGE YOU SHALL
LINE UP TO THE SPEAR SHOW LADIES AND GENTLEMEN,\. WE ARE DOING
Even I can't tolerate this guy anymore.
Let's move on,\. we've learned enough about spears.
Oh\..\..\.. I don't have much to say, really.
So uhh\..\..\.. guns are pretty cool I guess...
One of the most distinctive traits of a gun is that it
\C[2]shoots from really far away\C[0]. Oh,\. also \C[2]it is really
Firing a barrage of bullets isn't hard if you know how to
mash the right buttons,\. I hear.\. \C[1]There isn't even any
combos for guns\C[0].\. Just pull the trigger-\. bang.
Though,\. \C[1]bullets go straight\C[0] and \C[1]have a very
narrow hitbox\C[0]. You basically have to get hit by a bullet
to take damage,\. imagine that in an ARPG?!
Sometimes, I think when \C[3]I'm feelin' lucky\C[0],\. I feel
like \C[3]enemies die faster\C[0].\. I bet \C[6]luck\C[0] is
tied into the damage formula or something.
Oh!\. \C[2]There isn't any ammo for guns around here\C[0].\. The guns
Guns are fascinating to me\..\..\.. I wonder if I'll ever be
able to \C[2]make a better gun that has no cost\C[0]...
Here to learn about axes, are we?
My husband hired me to teach noob ass trash like you the ins
and outs of what an axe is and does.
Wow okay,\. a bit fuckin' harsh aren't we?
Maybe when you step up and show me how good at axe-wielding
you are, we can tango and I'll show you why they call me the
\C[27]Dancer of Axes\C[0].\. Consider yourselves lucky I'd even
Okay now,\. you don't need to use that title around here.\.
The plot hasn't unveiled my legendary axe-wielding skills yet!
I never thought I'd be able to meet you in person!\.
I've only heard about you through my husband at the front
But to think you'd come through here-\.
Speaking of which,\. why ARE you here?\.
\..\..\..He almost looks like your partner that you went with
on that adventure several years back\..\..\..
What in the world are such seasoned veterans doing in here?\.
This place is for weak ass beginners.
Ahh yeah well you know,\. it seems science on this world is
a tad different than where you met us before, so we're brushing
up on the basics here to make sure we got a firm understanding
on shit like damage formulai and what not.
You seem to be the axe expert, anything you got to tell me
about how axes differ on this world from everywhere else?
\}Stupid JABS making things different than standard turn-based battles...\{
There are a couple things you should probably be aware of.
For instance, there are two axes around here,\. \C[1]a one-handed
Some are \C[2]designed to be wielded with one hand\C[0], however,\.
despite being able to equip a shield with them,\. you \C[1]pay the
price with reduced mobility and higher cooldowns\C[0].
However, they are axes, so they are \C[3]still a good amount stronger\C[0]
Axes damage formula even \C[4]leverages your maximum life\C[0] as
a factor when dealing damage.\. So if you plan on wielding axes,\.
you probably want to make sure you \C[1]power up your life a bit with
Two-handed axes are a bit different.\.
With the sacrifice of your offhand slot,\. you gain a much
higher level of control over your axe.
Two hands means the weight is distributed between both arms.\.
What happens when you have less weight?
\C[1]Wielding an axe with two hands means you can swing it faster?\C[0]
I know it seems a bit weird, and may even make you ask "why don't
I wield every weapon with two hands to swing it fast!",\. but
of course in this ARPG, thats not possible.
So I think thats about it.\.
If you need me to repeat this info,\. I'll be right here!
Here to study the ways of the dark arts?
On this world,\. there are many types of magic.
But the most crude- and also most useful- form of magic is that
of which comes from your wand.
Most wands \C[1]don't have any form of combos\C[0] like traditional
melee weapons do,\. but they can shoot between \C[1]1, 2, 3, 4, and 8
They also tend to \C[1]boost your innate Force\C[0].
Naturally,\. since \C[1]Force\C[0] is the primary stat that
any aspiring mage would want to power up.
To boot,\. any of the various types of wands you can find can
\C[1]inflict any status ailments the hero or heroine bearing it
is able to inflict\C[0].\. For example, if a hero has a poison ring that
inflicts poison on-hit, \C[2]then all wand projectiles can inflict poison\C[0].
This differs from normal melee weapons in that \C[1]most melee
weapons only inflict status ailments with the final hit
With \C[1]all wands also only being 1-handed\C[0],\. you can wield
\C[2]mighty tomes\C[0] or \C[3]enchanted braces\C[0] in your offhand to match the
Clearly this makes wands the superior class of weapon.
I'm ready to run my mouth about where to shove that fist of yours.
Where do I shove this fist?
Where do I shove this fist?
So when it comes to fisting people to death,\. there is just
one major thing you should remember.
Keep punching until they are dead.
There isn't much more to tell.
Just think of it this way:
\C[2]The more you punch,\. the more it hurts.\C[0]
If you punch enough times in a row,\. \C[1]you'll enter a state of
flow where your punches will seem huge\C[0] and just pulverize
Though \C[1]it can be tiring to punch repeatedly\C[0] like that,\.
so you probably won't be able to do it often.\. \C[2]Combo-ing 5+
times is a total strain on the body\C[0],\. but worth it.\. \C[3]almost
no amount of physical defense will stop your fists\C[0] of death.
When you don the gloves of a fister,\. you forsake the power
of weapons and rely on your true raw strength.\. The only
You're not worth the breath it takes to hear it.
